meanings.definition: relating to or involving the gonads
meanings.sent1: The doctor discussed the gonadal changes during puberty.
meanings.sent2: The researcher studied the gonadal development in frogs.
meanings.sent3: The gonadal exam was not the most exciting part of the check-up.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for biology led her to specialize in gonadal research.
meanings.sent5: The textbook vividly described the intricate gonadal functions.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the reproductive organs that produce gametes
meanings.sent1: The scientist explained the importance of gonadal health for fertility.
meanings.sent2: The gonadal cells were carefully examined under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The gonadal party in the cell was where all the action happened.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to fitness was evident in his well-maintained gonadal system.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used diagrams to illustrate the role of gonadal organs in reproduction.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the testes or ovaries
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian checked the gonadal health of the cat.
meanings.sent2: The gonadal hormones play a crucial role in the body's functions.
meanings.sent3: The gonadal debate among scientists sparked interesting discussions.
meanings.sent4: Her gonadal instincts guided her towards a career in obstetrics.
meanings.sent5: The documentary highlighted the challenges of gonadal surgeries.
